an10.44:1.1: Ekam samayam bhagava kusinarayam viharati baliharane vanasande.
an10.44:2.1: “Codakena, bhikkhave, bhikkhuna param codetukamena panca dhamme ajjhattam paccavekkhitva panca dhamme ajjhattam upatthapetva paro codetabbo.
an10.44:2.3: Codakena, bhikkhave, bhikkhuna param codetukamena evam paccavekkhitabbam:
an10.44:2.4: ‘parisuddhakayasamacaro nu khomhi, parisuddhenamhi kayasamacarena samannagato acchiddena appatimamsena.
an10.44:2.5: Samvijjati nu kho me eso dhammo udahu no’ti?
an10.44:2.6: No ce, bhikkhave, bhikkhu parisuddhakayasamacaro hoti parisuddhena kayasamacarena samannagato acchiddena appatimamsena, tassa bhavanti vattaro:
an10.44:2.7: ‘ingha tava ayasma kayikam sikkhassu’ti, itissa bhavanti vattaro.
an10.44:3.1: Puna caparam, bhikkhave, codakena bhikkhuna param codetukamena evam paccavekkhitabbam:
an10.44:3.2: ‘parisuddhavacisamacaro nu khomhi, parisuddhenamhi vacisamacarena samannagato acchiddena appatimamsena.
an10.44:3.3: Samvijjati nu kho me eso dhammo udahu no’ti?
an10.44:3.4: No ce, bhikkhave, bhikkhu parisuddhavacisamacaro hoti parisuddhena vacisamacarena samannagato acchiddena appatimamsena, tassa bhavanti vattaro:
an10.44:3.5: ‘ingha tava ayasma vacasikam sikkhassu’ti, itissa bhavanti vattaro.
an10.44:4.1: Puna caparam, bhikkhave, codakena bhikkhuna param codetukamena evam paccavekkhitabbam:
an10.44:4.2: ‘mettam nu kho me cittam paccupatthitam sabrahmacarisu anaghatam.
an10.44:4.3: Samvijjati nu kho me eso dhammo udahu no’ti?
an10.44:4.4: No ce, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno mettam cittam paccupatthitam hoti sabrahmacarisu anaghatam, tassa bhavanti vattaro:
an10.44:4.5: ‘ingha tava ayasma sabrahmacarisu mettam cittam upatthapehi’ti, itissa bhavanti vattaro.
an10.44:5.1: Puna caparam, bhikkhave, codakena bhikkhuna param codetukamena evam paccavekkhitabbam:
an10.44:5.2: ‘bahussuto nu khomhi sutadharo sutasannicayo, ye te dhamma adikalyana majjhekalyana pariyosanakalyana sattham sabyanjanam kevalaparipunnam parisuddham brahmacariyam abhivadanti, tatharupa me dhamma bahussuta honti dhata vacasa paricita manasanupekkhita ditthiya suppatividdha.
an10.44:5.3: Samvijjati nu kho me eso dhammo udahu no’ti?
an10.44:5.4: No ce, bhikkhave, bhikkhu bahussuto hoti sutadharo sutasannicayo, ye te dhamma adikalyana majjhekalyana pariyosanakalyana sattham sabyanjanam kevalaparipunnam parisuddham brahmacariyam abhivadanti, tatharupassa dhamma bahussuta honti dhata vacasa paricita manasanupekkhita ditthiya suppatividdha, tassa bhavanti vattaro:
an10.44:5.5: ‘ingha tava ayasma agamam pariyapunassu’ti, itissa bhavanti vattaro.
an10.44:6.1: Puna caparam, bhikkhave, codakena bhikkhuna param codetukamena evam paccavekkhitabbam:
an10.44:6.2: ‘ubhayani kho pana me patimokkhani vittharena svagatani honti suvibhattani suppavattini suvinicchitani suttaso anubyanjanaso.
an10.44:6.3: Samvijjati nu kho me eso dhammo udahu no’ti?
an10.44:6.4: No ce, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno ubhayani patimokkhani vittharena svagatani honti suvibhattani suppavattini suvinicchitani suttaso anubyanjanaso, ‘idam panayasma, kattha vuttam bhagavata’ti, iti puttho na sampayissati.
an10.44:6.6: ‘ingha tava ayasma vinayam sikkhassu’ti, itissa bhavanti vattaro.
an10.44:7.8: Codakena, bhikkhave, bhikkhuna param codetukamena ime panca dhamme ajjhattam paccavekkhitva ime panca dhamme ajjhattam upatthapetva paro codetabbo”ti.
